channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump administration puts offshore wind projects on hold, citing mysterious Pentagon national security warning
item.description: Trump has been hostile to renewable energy, particularly offshore wind, and prioritizes fossil fuels to produce electricity.

item.title: SoftBank is racing to close a $22.5 billion OpenAI funding gap before 2026
item.description: SoftBank Group is racing to close a $22.5 billion funding commitment to OpenAI by year-end through an array of cash-raising schemes, including a sale ...

item.title: Former U.S. Secret Service agent says bringing your authentic self to work stifles teamwork: ‘You don’t get high performers, you get sloppiness’
item.description: “Could you imagine if I brought my authentic New York self to every interrogation I did?” asked former Secret Service agent Evy Poumpouras.

item.title: Business lessons of 2026, from Airbnb, Meta, Linkedin, and more
item.description: This year delivered whiplash: geopolitics, tariffs, and technology all shifting at once. And heading into 2026, the disruption isn’t easing up. Bob Sa...

item.title: Elon Musk’s net worth skyrockets to $749 billion, following pay package ruling
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk’s net worth surged to $749 billion late Friday after the Delaware Supreme Court reinstated Tesla stock options worth $139 billion ...

item.title: Mark Cuban says AI allows ‘creators to become exponentially more creative,’ but his advice didn’t land well with people working in the industry
item.description: “All you can see is dollar signs and ‘value’ instead of theft, exploitation, and job displacement,” one creative said in response.

item.title: Billionaire Larry Ellison comes to his son’s rescue, agreeing to personally guarantee over $40 billion to finance Paramount’s bid for Warner Bros.
item.description: Warner Bros. is in the middle of a tug-of-war between Netflix and David Ellison's company, Paramount Skydance.

item.title: 4 Ways to Drive Product Sales in an Unstable AI Landscape
item.description: These rules of thumb will help you optimize your site as more shoppers find products with the help of AI.

item.title: Meet the Chanel chief who hires for personality over talent or skills—and the 3 red flag traits she rejects
item.description: Exclusive: As Gen Z fights to stand out in one of the most competitive job markets in decades, Chanel says it’s looking for personality hires.

item.title: Home prices are falling in these 98 housing markets
item.description: Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter . According to our analysis of the ...

item.title: The CEO of Southwest Airlines Is Making Huge Change He Calls ‘Crazy’ and ‘Dumb Simple,’ but It’s Actually Brilliant—And It Starts in 10 Days
item.description: If you’re facing “meeting overwhelm,” try Southwest CEO Bob Jordan’s new productivity hack. I promise you’ll never go back.

item.title: How Businesses Can Turn Holiday Momentum Into Yearlong Success, According to a Marketing and Retail Strategist
item.description: With a clear view of what drives demand, retailers can turn holiday energy into long-term success.

item.title: How to Keep AI Burnout From Driving Away Top Applicants
item.description: We know that AI has turbocharged the recruitment process. But has it gone too far?

item.title: I Once Asked a CEO About Her Morning Routine. Her Answer Surprised Me.
item.description: Great leaders understand that if you don’t intentionally shape the start of your day, someone else will.

item.title: ‘Super flu’ virus tracker: Symptoms and latest update as subclade K influenza variant spreads
item.description: As many families are preparing to gather for the holidays, influenza (flu) cases are spiking across the country. According to the latest data from the...
